briefdescription.para: Checks to see if a timeout has been added.

simplesect.para: TRUE if there is a timeout or FALSE if not

briefdescription.para: Sets wether the timeout has been added.

parameterdescription.para: whether or not a timeout is added

simplesect.para: a timeout object or NULL if call has no timeout
a serial number for the reply or 0

briefdescription.para: Gets the connection associated with this pending call.

simplesect.para: the connection associated with the pending call

briefdescription.para: Gets the connection associated with this pending call.

simplesect.para: the connection associated with the pending call

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the pending call has received a reply yet, or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if a reply has been received

briefdescription.para: Calls notifier function for the pending call and sets the call to completed.
Sets the reply of a pending call with the given message, or if the message is NULL, by timing out the pending call.

parameterdescription.para: the message to complete the call with, or NULL to time out the call

briefdescription.para: If the pending call hasn't been timed out, add its timeout error reply to the connection's incoming message queue.

parameterdescription.para: the connection the call was sent to

briefdescription.para: Sets the reply message associated with the pending call to a timeout error.

parameterdescription.para: the message we are sending the error reply to

briefdescription.para: Creates a new pending reply object.

parameterdescription.para: length of timeout, -1 (or DBUS_TIMEOUT_USE_DEFAULT) for default, DBUS_TIMEOUT_INFINITE for no timeout
timeout handler, takes pending call as data

simplesect.para: a new DBusPendingCall or NULL if no memory.

briefdescription.para: Increments the reference count on a pending call, while the lock on its connection is already held.
Decrements the reference count on a pending call, freeing it if the count reaches 0.

detaileddescription.para: Assumes connection lock is already held.

briefdescription.para: Stores a pointer on a DBusPendingCall, along with an optional function to be used for freeing the data when the data is set again, or when the pending call is finalized.

detaileddescription.para: The slot number must have been allocated with dbus_pending_call_allocate_data_slot().

simplesect.para: TRUE if there was enough memory to store the data
